class_description:
A class which extends the EventListenerProxy
 specifically for adding a PropertyChangeListener
 with a "bound" property.
 Instances of this class can be added
 as PropertyChangeListeners to a bean
 which supports firing property change events. If the object has a getPropertyChangeListeners method
 then the array returned could be a mixture of PropertyChangeListener
 and PropertyChangeListenerProxy objects.

params.param_description: the name of the property to listen on

Methods.method_description:
Constructor which binds the PropertyChangeListener
 to a specific property.

return_description: the name of the named property associated with the listener

Methods.method_description: Returns the name of the named property associated with the listener.
Forwards the property change event to the listener delegate.
